alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 3:54AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow and moderate to strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches, except 8 to 15 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting 30 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Malad pass, Malad, Preston Thatcher, St Charles, Montpelier, Georgetown summit, and Georgetown. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially Monday night and Tuesday. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region
